short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replaces characters like - and ' with their proper typographical equivalents.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple, zero-configuration extension to convert simple quotes, dashes etc. like ' and -- with their proper typographical equivalents. It also tries to accommodate edge cases like "the â€™80s were amazing", and won't touch text that is probably computer code, such as that inside <code> elements, or things that look like JSON.
